    • Constructor Detail

      • JAXBContextResolver

        public JAXBContextResolver(java.lang.Class[] types)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructor - initializes the context based on the given types. This resolver is currently configured to use the "mapped" JSONConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        types - the types for which this resolver should be used
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong during initialization
